import { setOption } from "glider-js"; import { useState } from "react" import { FileText, MoreVertical, Search, User } from "react-feather" import './SearchWidget.css' export const SearchWidget = () => { const [isActive, setisActive] = useState(false); const [option, setOption] = useState(0); const handleChange = (e) => { setOption(e.target.value); } return (
setisActive(!isActive)} style={{display: "none"}}>
) }
